title: Drawing, 1780–90
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, on paper
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d and 457e)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Frontal view of a chair. The arms and legs are slightly curved, the back is divided in two halves- the upper padded and trapezoidal, the lower rectangular, with a caned inner oval.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1780–90.
1780–90. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-430.
